Package com.gr15.pacman.view.screen

package com.gr15.pacman.view.screen
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.gr15.pacman.view
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BaseView
    An abstract base class for all views managed by the ViewManager.
    GameOverView
    Simple Game Over screen with message and button.
    GameView
    Represents the main in-game view where the gameplay takes place.
    MainMenuView
    Represents the main menu view of the application, containing UI elements such as buttons for starting a new game, and exiting.
    PauseView
    Represents the main menu view of the application, containing UI elements such as buttons for starting a new game, resuming a game, and exiting.
